participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, she often finds joy in simple pleasures and daydreams of adventures.
participant_1.background: I like to take my time driving through the countryside and listening to music. I want to be an explorer. I daydream during work. I procrastinate on my lesson plans. I love animals and I want to help them.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and slightly impulsive, he enjoys the thrill of editing and expressing himself through music and video.
participant_2.background: I have a desktop computer with a fast processor and plenty of memory for editing my videos. At all times, I am wearing something black. My health nut friends don't know how much I love sweets. Traffic makes me mad. I love to sing to the radio in my car, even though I can't whistle.

content.text: I'm doing well! I just finished editing a video, how about you?
I'm just hanging out. I'm actually a teacher, but I love to explore!
That's so cool! I wish I could get out and explore more. I'm always stuck in the office working on videos.
I love taking road trips and just driving. I love to listen to music and just take my time.
That sounds amazing! I'm more of a city person myself, but I could definitely enjoy a road trip once in a while.
I love animals and I want to help them out. Maybe someday I'll start a non-profit or something.
That's so great! I love animals too. I have a dog and a cat at home.
I have a dog and a cat too! I love them so much.
My dog's name is Bailey and my cat's name is Mittens.
